mapper.select: select id, pass, name, birth, gender, hp, email, addr1, addr2, to_char(mdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') mdate from mypet_member where id=#{id}
select count(*) from mypet_member where id=#{id} and pass=#{pass}
mapper.update: update mypet_member set email=#{email}, addr1=#{addr1}, addr2=#{addr2} where id=#{id}
update mypet_care set email=#{email}, addr=#{addr1} where id=#{id}
update mypet_map set addr=#{addr1} where id=#{id}
update mypet_member set pass=#{pass} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select fid from mypet_free_diary where id=#{id}
select nid from mypet_near where id=#{id}
select * from mypet_near where id=#{id} order by startdate desc

select rno, fid, id, ftitle, fcontent, fdate, fhit, fheart, fnheart from (select rownum rno, fid, id, ftitle, fcontent, fdate, fhit, fheart, fnheart from (select rno, fid, id, ftitle, fcontent, fdate, fhit, fheart, fnheart from ( select rno, fid, id, ftitle, fcontent, to_char(fdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') fdate, fhit, fheart, fnheart from(select rownum rno, fid, id, ftitle, fcontent, fdate, fhit, fheart, fnheart from(select * from mypet_free_diary where id=#{id} order by fdate desc)) where rno between #{startnum} and #{endnum}) order by fid)) order by rno desc
select count(num) from(select rownum num from mypet_free_diary where id=#{id}) where num >= #{pagenum}

select rno, id, cid, seq_id, ccomment, cdate from (select rownum rno, id, cid, seq_id, ccomment, cdate from (select rno, id, cid, seq_id, ccomment, cdate from ( select rno, id, cid, seq_id, ccomment, to_char(cdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') cdate from(select rownum rno, id, cid, seq_id, ccomment, cdate from(select * from mypet_comment where id=#{id} order by cdate desc)) where rno between #{startnum} and #{endnum}) order by cid)) order by rno desc
select count(num) from(select rownum num from mypet_comment where id=#{id}) where num >= #{pagenum}
select ftitle from mypet_free_diary where fid=#{seq_id}
select ptitle from mypet_pictures_diary where pid=#{seq_id}
